docs.title: Pengenalan
docs.text: IMPACT4C ialah satu sistem berasaskan web yang bertujuan untuk memantau prestasi peserta program yang diuruskan oleh Bahagian Jaringan Industri & Masyarakat (BJIM) Universiti Sains Malaysia. Sistem IMPACT4C merupakan bank data yang mengadungi maklumat profil individu antaranya maklumat pencapaian peserta dari aspek penjanaan pendapatan, peningkatan produktiviti dan kemahiran bagi perbandingan pencapaian sebelum dan selepas program

docs.title: Fungsi Utama
docs.text:
• Menguruskan maklumat peserta program dan projek
  • Menguruskan maklumat pencapaian peserta
  • Menguruskan maklumat program dan projek

docs.title: About
docs.text: The Impact4c Developer Platform is updated frequently with new functionality and products to better suit your needs. We will be documenting all changes made to the platform’s products via this resource.

docs.title: Asas sistem IMPACT4C
docs.text:
IMPACT4C mempunyai beberapa jenis pengguna iaitu : - Peserta - Pentadbir - Pengurus Tertinggi (Super Admin)

Setiap jenis pengguna mempunyai fungsi yang berbeza. Penduan mendalam ada di bahagian Pengguna.

Untuk mengguna sistem Impact4c, pengguna perlu mencipta Program terlebih dahulu. Program adalah superset untuk projek, di dalam program boleh mencipta atau ditambah beberapa projek. Selepas mencipta program dan projek, pengguna boleh mencipta peserta dan mengisi pencapaian peserta.

Illustrasi arkitetur sistem IMPACT4C

docs.title: Cipta Akaun
Akuan pengguna pentadbir
Mencipta
docs.text: Pengguna pentadbir boleh didaftarkan oleh pengurus tertinggi. Untuk mencipta pengguna pentadbir baru, ikuti langkah-langkah berikut:

docs.title: Mengemaskini
Menghapuskan
Akuan pengguna peserta
Mencipta
docs.text: Pengguna peserta boleh didaftarkan oleh pengguna pentadbir. Untuk mencipta pengguna peserta baru, ikuti langkah-langkah berikut:

docs.title: Mengemaskini
Menghapuskan
Jenis-jenis pengguna dalam sistem IMPACT4C
Peserta
docs.text: Peserta adalah pengguna yang mempunyai akses hanya untuk mengisi transaksi bulanan ke atas pencapaian mereka. Peserta tidak boleh mengakses maklumat lain selain maklumat mereka sendiri. Peserta hanya boleh di daftarkan oleh Pentadbir.

docs.title: Pentadbir
docs.text: Pentadbir adalah pengguna yang mempunyai akses untuk menguruskan maklumat peserta, program dan projek. Pantadbir hanya boleh didaftar oleh Pengurus Tertinggi. Setiap pentadbir boleh mencipta program atau projek baru tartaluk pada jumlah program atau projek yang telah ditetapkan oleh Pengurus Tertinggi. Pentadbir juga boleh mengemaskini maklumat peserta dan pencapaian peserta.

docs.title: Pengurus Tertinggi (Super Admin)
docs.text: Pengurus Tertinggi adalah pengguna yang mempunyai akses untuk menguruskan maklumat pentadbir dan pengurus tertinggi.

About

This page is dedicated to document any changes in the website application

October 21, 2021

docs.title: Today, we compile all the data from the client in Phase 1

Today, we develope the Participants profile.
Today, we introduced the UI design for setting.
Today, we develope the complete Total income UI for participants.
Today, we added the Programe and Project names.
Today, we added the graph in dashboard
Today, we added SSL for impact4c.my
Today, we made some major improvement

April 05, 2022

docs.title: Today, we added access for the client, participants and funders.
Today, we added access for the client, participants and funders.

Today, we design new UI in Phase 2

Today, we initiated Beta stage for Phase 2.

Today, we introduce the new logo of IMPACT4C
Today, we added the Awas sign before user deleting the program.
Today, we added the new logo and fix the filter.
Today, we identify the bug which cause the filter function not working.

Today, we had meeting with the client. Client briefly share their ideas on the new core architecture add expenses (graph visualize will be finalise), develope an mobile apps based on the income and expenses for users experience, static website for madu kelulut and pepper.
Today, we had a final amend on the Phase 2 Moving to Alpha stage
Today, we added the new Melaka and Labuan, and correct the typo of Selangor. The bug that cause unable to add program and project has been removed.
Today, we already in Alpha stage and deployed the Phase 2 into production
Today, we had meeting on the advance maintainence Phase 3 development.
Today, we started to plan the changes in future developement.
Today, we try remove bug which caused but the client mistaken it wrongly.
Today, we had started to identify the client case study
Today, we identify the roles to create
Today, we had started the multi-user development.
Today, we need to insert the baselin income in Add Profile setting. View baseline income in Participant profile.
Today, we create new database for the developement of multi-user. The migration to new system is ongoing.
Today, the organisation in setting is under progress.
Today, we had a meeting to understand the practical flow and its coding architecture.
Today, we identify another UI template called Tabler a Premium dashboard template with responsive setting.
Today, we had a meeting with the client to brief about the multiuser flow. Super admin is requested to add limited participants features.
Today, we finalizing the organisation under setting.
Today, we are trying to create an email for impac4c to be sent from the server (example reset password)
Today, we added the DKIM, DKIM2 and the function of connect email domains which assist the user to receive notification
Today, we finalised the use case of USER under setting
Getting started
docs.text:
Info

Learn how to register as participant, admin, funder, porject leader, program leader, log in and configure IMPACT4C to allow you to contribute to projects directly from your machine.

Part 1: Log in the website.

docs.title: 1. Landing Page
docs.text: • User arrives at the website's landing page and is presented with the option to log in.

docs.title: 2. Clicking "Log In"
docs.text: • User clicks on the "Log In" button or link, which takes them to the login page.

docs.title: 3. Entering Credentials
docs.text:
User is presented with a login form that, (1) typically includes fields for.

  1. Please fill username or email address and Password contain
Tip

Make sure you double check your username and password

Part 2: Understand the Sidebar

Note

Here, we want to ensure that you have the most comfortable and efficient experience when managing your profile and needs. We would like to introduce you to some key sections of our dashboard:

  • Papan pemuka: This is where you will find important overviews and the latest updates.

  • Profil peserta: In this section, you can access and update your personal information quickly and easily.

  • Kemaskini: In this section, you can make changes to your profile and account details quickly and easily.

  • Settings: This menu allows you to customize your dashboard and account settings to meet your needs and preferences.

  • Bantuan: If you need assistance, have questions, or require guidance, this section provides support resources and contact information for our support team.

Sidebar

Part 2a: Papan pemuka

There are 3 views on this Papan pemuka.

Filter and total income

This page displays a summary of income by year and program detailed report.

Filter and total income

Yearly income with Program income

This page displays a total income for all by year and the total income for all by program.

Yearly income with Program income

Participants detail

This page displays a income and detailed results for each participant.

Participants detail. Tip

On the Participant details view, user is able to extract nessary filtered data by clicking exsport icon.

Part 2b: Profil peserta

Info

This page provides participant information by location.

  B -->|Yes| C[Hmm...];
  C --> D[Debug];
  D --> B;
  B ---->|No| E[Yay!];

Text can be deleted and replacement text added. This can also be combined into onea single operation. Highlighting is also possible and comments can be added inline.

Formatting can also be applied to blocks by putting the opening and closing tags on separate lines and adding new lines between the tags and the content.
